item.title: Don't argue with an idiot
item.description:
Don’t argue with an idiot, he will drag you down to his level and beat you with experience.

– Mark Twain (allegedly)
item.content:encoded:
Don’t argue with an idiot, he will drag you down to his level and beat you with experience.

– Mark Twain (allegedly)
